descriptionModels.description: On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again

On your turn, you can take one additional action on top of your regular action and a possible bonus action. Once you use this feature twice, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again. You can't use it twice on the same turn
